ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture. Includes a Parody of an Absolut Vodka ad.
53 annoying things about modern advertising.
More realistic views of things that happened in the movie.
Improbable and dangerous ways to save (or steal) gas.
In the first strip, the Black Spy nightly ruins a statue of the White Spy, so the White Spy booby-traps the statue. In the second strip, the White Spy falls for a fake magic trick perpetrated by the Black Spy.
A collection of cartoons.
Monroe get a series of summer jobs calming down animals and people in an unconventional way.
Bush's advisors and other associates that have been removed from office.
Goofy questions.
Stills from the movie "Bionic Woman" with humorous captions.
The Sopranos move in on the reality show business with their own show that kills off the competition.

ComicInfo.Title: The Fundalini Pages; MAD's 50 Worst Things About Advertising; A MAD Look At Ratatouille; A Collection of Significantly Stupid Strategies for Battling Skyrocketing Gas Prices; Spy Vs. Spy; The Strip Club; Monroe and...The Summer Jobs Part 2; George W. Bush's Colonoscopy Results; Questions We'd Love To See The Media Ask Presidential Candidates; MAD's Better, Stronger, Faster Outtakes from Bionic Woman; America's Next Top Mobster; Drawn-Out Dramas
